works.title: Oxygen microsensor studies on zooxanthellate clionaid ponges from the Costa Brava, Mediteranean Sea.
works.abstract: Photosynthetic properties of two symbiotic demosponges were compared using Clark-type oxygen microsensors. The putatively distinct sponge species, Cliona viridis (Schmidt, 1862) and Cliona nigricans (Schmidt, 1862) were discriminated by their mean megasclere lengths of 296 and 387 mu m, respectively. Photosynthetic behavior was used to generate add...
